message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe is worth a lot to the right person. I'm open to offers, but my starting price is $15000. Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me in the middle at $10000?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! $8000 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $12000. That's a fair compromise given the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $12000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway from $10000, so how about $11000?
